article_title: 4 Healthcare Trends You Should Be Excited About

article_metadata.description: With the rollout of Obamacare, the national focus of healthcare technology has unfortunately revolved around the implementation challenges of the federal health insurance website. This narrow attention ignores some of the more exciting developments in this rapidly changing industry. This article looks at several future trends in the health technology space.
article_metadata.author: Robert J. Szczerba
